goal.ch: 水及廢水處理為環境工程領域基本學科，本課程由給水工程與下水道工程之範疇談起，繼而介紹給水與污水處理之原理及技術，包括混凝沈澱、過濾、吸附、消毒、活性污泥法、生物膜法、營養鹽處理、污泥處理及高級處理等單元，期能教導學生了解水及廢水處理之專業知識，並建立水及廢水處理技術應用之能力。
goal.en: "The water and wastewater treatment is the basic course of environmental engineering. The course introduces various unit operations and processes for water and wastewater treatment, including sedimentation, filtration, adsorption, coagulation and disinfection, activated sludge, biofilm processes and anaerobic processes and thickening, digestion and dewatering for sludge handling. The course not only introduces the principle of each unit, also include the basic mathematical model and functional design method."

outline.ch:
"1.給水工程總論
2.給水水質
3.沈澱、混凝及膠凝
4.過濾、消毒
5.新穎給水處理技術
6.給水工程概念設計
7.污水工程總論
8.污水性質、水體保育
9.污水處理概論及前處理
10.生物處理(活性污泥法、生物膜法)
11.營養鹽處理、高級處理
12.污泥處理及資源化
13.新穎污水處理技術
14.污水工程概念設計"
outline.en:
"1.Water supply engineering
2.Water quality
3.Sedimentation,Coagulation and flocculation
4.Filtration, Disinfection
5.Novel technology of water treatment
6.Concept design of water treatment
7.Wastewater treatment engineering
8.Wastewater and water conservation
9.Pretreatment
10.Biological treatment - activated sludge process and biofilm
11.Nutrient removal and tertiary treatment
12.Sludge treatment and reuse
13.Novel technology of wastewater treatment
14.Concept design of wastewater treatment"

textbook.ch:
"1.給水工程 (衛生工程． 自來水篇) 高肇藩編著
2.下水道學，台灣水環境再生協會，歐陽嶠暉主編，2016。
3.自編教材"
textbook.en:
"1.Wastewater Engineering – Treatment and Reuse, Metcalf & Eddy Inc., McGraw-Hill Book Company, 2003.
2.Water and Wastewater Technology, 4th ed., Hammer and Hammer, Prentice-Hall Inc., 2001."

flexDiscription.ch:
第17週 自主學習-水處理實務案例
第18週 自主學習-污水處理實務案例
flexDiscription.en:
Week 17, Case discussion of water treatment.
Week 18, Case discussion of wastewater treatment.

ch.competencies: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
工程技術與生態環境之互動
工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神

en.competencies: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing  Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical  Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public
